meanings.definition: Small, rounded protuberances on the surface of the tongue.
meanings.sent1: The papillae on my tongue help me taste different flavors.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can examine your tongue's papillae to check for any issues.
meanings.sent3: When I stuck out my tongue, the papillae looked like tiny bumps.
meanings.sent4: The papillae on my tongue are like little taste buds reaching out.
meanings.sent5: The papillae on the tongue make it rough and interesting.

meanings.sent1: The papillae on the skin can sometimes feel sensitive.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the small papillae on her skin after being in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The papillae on his skin made him feel like a human strawberry.
meanings.sent4: Her skin's papillae were like tiny hills on a map.
meanings.sent5: The papillae on the skin give it a unique texture.

meanings.definition: Small, raised areas on the surface of certain tissues.
meanings.sent1: The papillae on the tissue were barely visible without a microscope.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the tissue's papillae under a magnifying glass.
meanings.sent3: The papillae on the tissue looked like tiny mountains under the light.
meanings.sent4: The papillae on the tissue were like secret codes waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: The tissue's papillae added an interesting texture to its surface.
